title: Simplify Development Task UI by removing clutter
description: Remove Branch display, PR created and ready for development status text, and Rebase link from Development Task cards to create a cleaner, more focused interface
asA: project manager using the AIPM workspace
iWant: the Development Task cards to display only essential information
soThat: I can focus on the core task details without visual distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch name paragraph is not rendered in task cards
PR created and ready for development status text is removed
Rebase link is not displayed in task actions
Essential elements remain: assignee input, Generate Code button
Error states and status updates still show when relevant
